segments.text: Do you have any questions you want to ask ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I'd like to know if there would be any future opportunities for specific training .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If necessary there will be . Any other questions ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When will I know your decision ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We'll give you our decision in a few days . How can we get in touch with you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can be reached at my office during work hours and at home in the evening . My office phone number and home phone number are in my resume .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you for your interest in our company .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , sir . I expect to hear from you as soon as possible .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would you please let the next applicant come in on your way out ?
segments.speaker: S1
